sql: SELECT * FROM penguins WHERE species = "Adelie"
SELECT * FROM penguins WHERE species = "Chinstrap"
SELECT * FROM penguins WHERE species = "Gentoo"
SELECT * FROM penguins WHERE island = "Torgersen"
description: Get all observations from Torgersen island

sql: SELECT * FROM penguins WHERE island = "Biscoe"
description: Get all observations from Biscoe island

sql: SELECT species, AVG(bill_length_mm) FROM penguins GROUP BY species
SELECT species, AVG(bill_depth_mm) FROM penguins GROUP BY species
SELECT species, AVG(flipper_length_mm) FROM penguins GROUP BY species
SELECT species, AVG(body_mass_g) FROM penguins GROUP BY species
SELECT species, COUNT(*) FROM penguins GROUP BY species
SELECT island, COUNT(*) FROM penguins GROUP BY island
SELECT sex, COUNT(*) FROM penguins GROUP BY sex
SELECT species, island, COUNT(*) FROM penguins GROUP BY species, island
SELECT species, sex, AVG(body_mass_g) FROM penguins GROUP BY species, sex
description: Average body mass by species and sex

sql: SELECT island, species, AVG(bill_length_mm) FROM penguins GROUP BY island, species
description: Average bill length by island and species

sql:
SELECT p.species, s.scientific_name, AVG(p.body_mass_g) 
                     FROM penguins p JOIN species_info s ON p.species = s.species 
                     GROUP BY p.species
description: Average body mass with scientific names

sql:
SELECT p.island, i.area_km2, COUNT(*) 
                     FROM penguins p JOIN island_info i ON p.island = i.island 
                     GROUP BY p.island

SELECT p.species, s.habitat, AVG(p.flipper_length_mm) 
                     FROM penguins p JOIN species_info s ON p.species = s.species 
                     GROUP BY p.species
description: Average flipper length with habitat info

sql: SELECT AVG(bill_length_mm) FROM penguins WHERE body_mass_g > 4000
description: Average bill length for heavy penguins

sql: SELECT AVG(flipper_length_mm) FROM penguins WHERE bill_depth_mm > 18
description: Average flipper length for deep bills

sql:
SELECT species, AVG(bill_length_mm) 
                     FROM penguins 
                     WHERE body_mass_g > 3500 
                     GROUP BY species
description: Average bill length by species for larger penguins

sql:
SELECT * FROM penguins 
                     WHERE bill_length_mm > 45 AND flipper_length_mm > 200
description: Find large penguins (long bill and flipper)

sql:
SELECT species, COUNT(*) FROM penguins 
                     WHERE body_mass_g BETWEEN 3000 AND 4000 
                     GROUP BY species
SELECT species, MAX(body_mass_g), MIN(body_mass_g) FROM penguins GROUP BY species
SELECT island, MAX(bill_length_mm), MIN(bill_length_mm) FROM penguins GROUP BY island
SELECT researcher, COUNT(*) FROM penguins GROUP BY researcher
SELECT researcher, species, AVG(body_mass_g) FROM penguins GROUP BY researcher, species
description: Average body mass by researcher and species

sql: SELECT * FROM penguins ORDER BY body_mass_g DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT species, bill_length_mm FROM penguins ORDER BY bill_length_mm ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT sex, AVG(body_mass_g) FROM penguins GROUP BY sex
SELECT species, sex, AVG(flipper_length_mm) FROM penguins GROUP BY species, sex
description: Average flipper length by species and sex
